description.value: As an illusionist, you use magic to create images, figments, and phantasms to baffle your enemies. You understand that perception is reality. You add one 1st-level illusion spell (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Object]{Illusory Object}) to your spellbook. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Warped Terrain]{Warped Terrain} school spell.
